title: AHS Apocalypse Episode 8 Review SPOILERS!!
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I’m mad they made this episode the shortest one and it’s Halloween 🙄🙄🙄
This episode was just okay, it's freaking Halloween and for a show like AHS you just kinda expect more. ESPECIALLY on today of all days.

The episode was good but not my favourite. It felt too short and with 2 episodes left I don't want them to rush the ending. But I'll admit I loved seeing Venable she fully looked like Velma and Daphne if they had a child.
The episode sounds shit; I'm really worried that season 8 is going to end in a HUGE anti-climax. 2 episodes left, yet we've barely scratched the surface. The first 2 episodes were a waste of time.

Sounds like an underwhelming episode 
smh
